pluggable.name: Habari Media Silo
pluggable.author: The Habari Community
pluggable.description: Provides simple file uploading and embedding functionality.

help.value:
This plugin provides basic media functionality by allowing users to insert into posts images that exist on the server.

Depending on server capabilities, users may also be able to upload new images and create directories for new images on the server.

Upon initialization, this plugin will attempt to create a /user/files directory under your Habari installation. You may need to alter permissions to allow this action.
